name: Quântico
description: During the CERN project premier there was an accident, which resulted in an explosion that generated an interdimensional gap, from this gap emerged several creatures from another dimension whose spread chaos throughout the laboratory. During this disorder, Mrs. Charlote, responsible for the leadership of the project, was caught by the crack and ended up being trapped. Upon seeing this, her boyfriend, Dr. Leonardo will face the various dangers arising from this rift in order to save his girlfriend.
